mapper.insert: insert into user (username, pass, email) values (#{username}, #{pass}, #{email})
mapper.update: update user set username = #{username}, pass = #{pass}, email = #{email} where id = #{id};
mapper.select: select u.id as user_id, u.username as user_username, u.email as user_email, l.id as language_id, l.name as language_name, a.id as address_id, a.address as address, c.id as city_id, c.name as city_name, p.id as country_id, p.name as country_name, p.priceMultiplier as priceMultiplier from user u left outer join language l on u.id_language = l.id left outer join address a on u.id_address = a.id left outer join city c on a.id_city = c.id left outer join country p on c.id_country = p.id where u.id = 1
